name: Pokemon Safari
description:
Catch them all, fight the Rival, win the treasure... Like the real thing, except it takes a minute to finish.

This is my first Bitsy game about walking around and encountering alive pixelated Pokemon! My daughter's verdict: "Why I can't go into water?! Why it's so short? Make more!"

The Pokemon word, monster names and many other words and shapes are property of the Pokemon Company.
